bomberman.core.logic
Interface PhysicsEntity

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaromDecorator, Block, Bomb, Bomber, BomberDecorator, BrickBlock, Door, DynamicPhysicsEntity, Enemy, EnemyBarom, EnemyMaron, EnemyMinvo, EnemyOnil, EnemyPontan, FireEntity, FreeBlock, MaronDecorator, MinvoDecorator, OnilDecorator, PontanDecorator, PowerUp, PowerUpBomb, PowerUpBombKick, PowerUpBombPass, PowerUpBombRangeDown, PowerUpBombRangeUp, PowerUpLife, PowerUpSkull, PowerUpSpeedDown, PowerUpSpeedUp, PowerUpTimeDown, PowerUpTimeUp, WallBlock
public interface PhysicsEntity

An interface for entities that have an associated Body for modeling their physical interactions.

Nested Class Summary
static interface PhysicsEntity.HasContactListener
          A marker interface for whether this physics entity listens for contact with other entities.
 
Method Summary
 Body getBody()
          Returns the body used in physics simulation for this entity.
 Vector2 getBodyDimensions()
          Gets the body dimensions in pixels.
 Vector2 getBodyPosition()
          Gets the body position in Box2d scaled reference system.
 Vector2 getBodyRealPosition()
          Gets the body real position (referred to Box2d scaled proportion system}.
 Vector2 getBottomCenter()
          Gets the bottom center of the entity.
 Vector2 getCenter()
          Gets the entity center in pixels.
 float getDimension()
          Gets the entity width and height dimension (assuming square reference system}.
 Vector2 getPosition()
          Gets the position in pixels.
 Vector2 getScaledPosition()
          Gets the position in Box2d scaled reference system.
 void setCenter(Vector2 pos)
          Sets the entity position by its center in pixels (it also affects the Box2d Body position).
 void setPosition(Vector2 v)
          Sets the entity position in pixels (it also affects the Box2d Body position).
